text:
does anyone know the name of the "system" variable for the number of blog posts to show on a listing page?

i know you change it here in the settings; that's not my question. I need to read that "3" (or 4 or 6 or 18, depending on the blog) into the template and use that number in a calculation.

i've tried posts_per_page, posts_per_listing_page, all manner of guesses, and the documentation hasn't surfaced anything except how to set a number in this box or set a brand new variable, neither of which helpful to this cause.
FYI i finally found it in a buried community post. it's group.posts_per_listing_page

Hello everyone, I need help. Currently, I want to write a function to filter the quantity of beds and above based on the selected options. However, my current function only filters items with a quantity that matches the selected number.
